markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 633 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Light effects overcome non-magical darkness in the area, and can [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) magical [darkness](/Traits.aspx?ID=39). You must usually target darkness magic with your light magic directly to counteract the darkness, but some light spells automatically attempt to counteract darkness.
name: Light
